name: jQuery.fn.extend
title: jQuery.fn.extend()
desc: Merge the contents of an object onto the jQuery prototype to provide new jQuery instance methods.

argument.desc: An object to merge onto the jQuery prototype.
argument.name: object

examples.desc: Add two methods to the jQuery prototype ($.fn) object and then use one of them.
examples.html:
<label><input type="checkbox" name="foo"> Foo</label>
<label><input type="checkbox" name="bar"> Bar</label>

entries.longdesc: The jQuery.fn.extend() method extends the jQuery prototype ($.fn) object to provide new methods that can be chained to the jQuery() function.
